headline: Here's How Many Shares of Lowe's You Should Own to Get $500 in Yearly Dividends
summary: Many people recognize Lowe's (NYSE: LOW) as a major home improvement retailer, but it's also built an impressive track record as a dividend payer.  Calculating how much you can earn from the payments can prove useful in making investment decisions.  How many shares of Lowe's do you need to own to bring in $500 in annual dividends?

headline: How Might The November Inflation Report Rattle Stock Markets
summary: The upcoming November 2024 CPI report will test the stock market rally. Read more to see my thoughts on the report.
